body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jonathan Brown and the customer's name is Alexis Stewart.  The conversation is about Meta4 (a Jewellery Store ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Jonathan Brown, and I am a customer service representative at Meta4, your go-to jewellery store. What is your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jonathan, I am Alexis Stewart.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Alexis! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed regarding my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be. Can you please provide me with your order number so that I can look it up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Also, could you please confirm your email address for me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Alexis. I have your order and email on file now. Let me take a moment to check the status of your order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! I appreciate your patience. Thank you for your time today, and if you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
